title: Charcold
desc:
Post 709
- If <:black:1106265022453268530>, after a turn in your hand, change color to ❄️
- If ❄️, then after a turn in your hand, change color to <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, can now also be played if an <:inferno:1118594776716021780> <:black:1106265022453268530> or ❄️ was played before you and it is your turn
- If <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, after a turn in your hand, change color to <:black:1106265022453268530>
- If played as ❄️, choose a player
